issues: Coordinate discrepancy: 10.52 km distance between asserted coordinates (42.013, -93.743) and geocoded location from 'USA: Iowa, Ames' (42.0267567, -93.6170448)
Different county locations: Asserted coords place sample in Boone County, while geocoded location is in Story County
Limited environmental features near asserted coordinates - only cemetery and fence within 1000m radius
Weather station data sourced from 9.5 km away, reducing precision
geo_loc_name format could be more specific - lacks detailed locality information beyond city level
recommendations: Verify and reconcile coordinate discrepancy - confirm whether sample was collected at asserted coordinates or closer to Ames city center
Add more specific locality information to geo_loc_name field (e.g., farm name, field identifier, or street address)
Cross-reference with field collection logs to determine correct sampling location
Consider adding GPS accuracy/precision metadata to indicate coordinate reliability
Validate coordinates against other samples from the same study chronosequence to ensure spatial consistency
Add environmental context fields describing the specific agricultural field characteristics
